summary: Accomplished operations professional with a strong background in driving efficiency, scaling business processes, and leading cross-departmental collaboration in tech environments. Expert in leveraging data analytics and organizational strategies to support sustained growth and operational excellence in dynamic settings.
skills: Project Management (Jira, Asana, Trello, Monday, Notion)

experience.description: Led initiatives to improve operational efficiency and customer retention through advanced analytics and process automation. Developed and managed business metrics, successfully integrating tools such as Salesforce and Tableau to enhance data-driven decision-making and performance monitoring across teams.

Managed key client relationships and drove product adoption through strategic use of CRM systems, maintaining high retention rates and achieving upsell targets. Played a pivotal role in the training and development of new hires, fostering a culture of continuous learning and operational excellence.
Spearheaded sales initiatives, directly contributing to the substantial growth of the sales team and exceeding multi-year contract goals through effective client management and product positioning.

Oversaw client onboarding and managed partner relationships, optimizing business operations and facilitating ecommerce solutions. Involved in comprehensive training and development activities, enhancing team capabilities and performance.
